content: leggy frog pattern b y t h e p l u s h y p l a c e materials abbreviations bernat velvet yarn r1- round 1 5mm crochet hook chain- chain small length of single_crochet- single_crochet black yarn half_double_crochet- half double 12mm safety eyes crochet tapestry needle decrease- single scissors crochet 2 together stuffing decrease- invisible stitch marker decrease sts-stitches notes i adapted this pattern from the original colorcarnaval on youtube check her pattern out and see which way you prefer to crochet this cute frog this pattern is written in english and uses us crochet terminology please do not reproduce or sell this pattern feel free to sell the finished object body r1-2 ch8 2hdc in 2nd chain from hook 5 single_crochet in next 5chs 4hdc in last chain on bottom side of the chain - 5sc 2hdc in next st refer to image 1 you should have a total of 18 sts r3 decrease 7sc decrease 7sc 16 image 1 r4 single_crochet around 16 insert safety eyes between r2-3 refer to image 2 r5 increase 7sc increase 7sc 18 r6-10 single_crochet around 18 r11 2sc ch12 in 2nd chain from hook- single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet decrease with the st at the bottom of the chain image 2 from the previous row and the next st in the row refer to image 3 & 4 image 3 image 4 r11 continued 8sc ch12 in 2nd chain from hook- single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet decrease with the st at the bottom of the chain from the previous row and the next st in the row 6sc 18 r12-15 single_crochet around 18 r16 4sc ch12 in 2nd chain from hook- single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet decrease with the st at the bottom of the chain from the previous row and the next st in the row 8sc ch12 in 2nd chain from hook- single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet decrease with the st at the bottom of the chain from the previous row and the next st in the row 4sc 18 complete 4sc to reach the side of the frog stuff the body and single_crochet the opening closed cut yarn and weave in ends optional sew smile congratulations you ve finished crocheting your frog if you post on instagram please tag me @the plushy place so i can see your cute creations
